abstract.t: Recently several multicast mechanisms were proposed that scale betterwith the number of multicast sessions than traditional multicast does(DCM [BLAZ], SGM [BOIV], Somecast [HELD], MDO6 [IMAI], CLM [OOMS],ERM [SHAN], REUNITE [STOI]). These proposals are also known asExplict Multicast (xcast; explicit list of destinations) or SmallGroup Multicast (sgm; the main application being few-to-fewcommunication). To stimulate and streamline the discussion thisdraft is an attempt to make a taxonomy of these mechanisms.
